name: Yuusha 30 Second [PSP]
description:
The world is going to end in 30 Seconds, our only hope is Priscilla and a fairy Time Manipulation powers. Created for the One Map Game Challenge on RPG Maker Forums.

This game is heavily inspired by Marvelous Entertainment's "Half-Minute Hero" series, which is a RPG that streamlines the core JRPG mechanics to a satirical degree. 

This is a complete game by the standards of the One Map Game Challenge, but it's also a potential tech demo/proof of concept of trying to mimic "Half-Minute Hero's" game mechanics in RPG Maker. I would love to expand on this and turn it into a larger game.
